org.shared.net.filter

Class Filters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.net.filter.Filters

  • public class Filters
extends Object
    A static utility class in support of filtering.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <I,O> OobFilter<I,O> asOobFilter(Filter<I,O> filter)
      Wraps the given Filter with an OobFilter adapter that has trivial behavior on OobEvents.
      static <V> Queue<V> createQueue()
      Creates a new coalescing Queue whose Queue.add(Object) method incorporates an element only if the tail element is not the same (by reference equality).
      static <V> Queue<V> readOnlyQueue(Queue<V> backing)
      Creates a read-only Queue backed by the given Queue.
      static <T> void transfer(Queue<T> inputs, Queue<T> outputs)
      Transfers elements from the given input Queue to the given output Queue.
      static <V> Queue<V> writeOnlyQueue(Queue<V> backing)
      Creates a write-only Queue backed by the given Queue.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createQueue

        public static final <V> Queue<V> createQueue()
        Creates a new coalescing Queue whose Queue.add(Object) method incorporates an element only if the tail element is not the same (by reference equality). This is an optimization that should be acceptable for the purposes of filtering.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type.

      • readOnlyQueue

        public static final <V> Queue<V> readOnlyQueue(Queue<V> backing)
        Creates a read-only Queue backed by the given Queue.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type.

      • writeOnlyQueue

        public static final <V> Queue<V> writeOnlyQueue(Queue<V> backing)
        Creates a write-only Queue backed by the given Queue.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type.

      • asOobFilter

        public static final <I,O> OobFilter<I,O> asOobFilter(Filter<I,O> filter)
        Wraps the given Filter with an OobFilter adapter that has trivial behavior on OobEvents.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the inbound type.
        O - the outbound type.
        Parameters:
        filter - the Filter.
        Returns:
        the OobFilter adapter, or the original Filter if it is already an instance.

      • transfer

        public static final <T> void transfer(Queue<T> inputs,
                Queue<T> outputs)
        Transfers elements from the given input Queue to the given output Queue.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the element type.
